name: Gravity Labyrinth
description:
Gravity Labyrinth is a 3D Platformer where the alteration of the gravity reveals new viewpoints to explore the environment!

Run, jump and climb on every surfaces to find all diamonds and secrets in original 3D world!

Are you ready to take the plunge into a new and exciting adventure?

Level 1: "Like a bird in the sky"

Controls

Playable with mouse/keyboard or Xbox360 controller.

Available in english et en français.


Work in progress

This project is in development: currently, there is only 1 playable level. More levels will be implemented.

It's a one man game development. Please consider this before leaving a comment.


Have fun, share it

Hope you will have fun with this game! If you enjoy the game, rate it, share it with yours friends and also you can donate to help me to create more levels!


Credits

Thanks to the Unity community! Some assets/tools I'm using to make this game:

Level design

Music

Sound effects

Custom character and animation

FX Particles
